Enhance Your Clinical Workflow with IntelliDoctor for Bahmni

Discover the IntelliDoctor Chrome extension—your essential companion for streamlined medical consultations within Bahmni. Harnessing the power of advanced AI and seamless integration, IntelliDoctor transforms clinical processes into efficient, accurate, and insightful experiences.

Key Features and Benefits:
	1.	Effortless Transcription
Dictate your notes during consultations. IntelliDoctor converts your speech into structured, accurate records, eliminating the need for manual data entry.
	2.	AI-Powered Clinical Insights
IntelliDoctor supports your diagnostic and therapeutic decisions in real time, offering evidence-based recommendations on diagnostics, medications, and exams directly within your Bahmni EHR system.
	3.	Structured Information Extraction
Automatically extract and organize key patient information into actionable insights, saving you time while increasing accuracy in medical records.
	4.	Decision Support System Integration
Access IntelliDoctor’s clinical decision support, including:
	•	Differential diagnoses
	•	Drug interactions
	•	Preventive care guidelines
	•	Evidence-based therapeutic protocols
	5.	Streamlined Documentation Workflow
Automatically feed completed consultation summaries and prescriptions back into Bahmni. IntelliDoctor minimizes documentation errors and ensures that EHR data is precise and up-to-date.
	6.	Time-Saving and Reliable
Reduce administrative burden and consultation time while improving the quality of care. 60% of IntelliDoctor users report significant reductions in documentation time.

Who Can Benefit?
IntelliDoctor is designed for physicians and healthcare teams using Bahmni EHR, seeking to improve clinical accuracy, efficiency, and patient safety.

How It Works:
	1.	Install the IntelliDoctor extension from the Chrome Web Store.
	2.	Use IntelliDoctor to capture consultation details via voice or text input.
	3.	Receive tailored clinical insights and evidence-based recommendations directly within Bahmni.
	4.	Automatically update Bahmni with the summarized data, including diagnostics, therapeutic plans, and prescriptions.

Trusted AI for Healthcare Professionals
IntelliDoctor’s AI is designed for reliability, sourcing only from peer-reviewed medical literature and globally recognized guidelines. Built with privacy and security as priorities, IntelliDoctor complies with data protection regulations like GDPR and LGPD 

Why Choose IntelliDoctor?
	•	Enhance patient outcomes through consistent and evidence-based decisions.
	•	Save time with intelligent automation and reduce burnout by focusing on patient care.
	•	Improve EHR data quality and reduce errors.

Join the growing number of healthcare providers revolutionizing their practice with IntelliDoctor and Bahmni. Experience a smarter way to deliver care.
